snippet.title: Silent Hill 2: Enhanced Edition (PC) Demonstration Trailer
snippet.description:
To experience these improvements for yourself, go to the following page: 
http://www.enhanced.townofsilenthill.com/SH2/

Silent Hill 2: Enhanced Edition is a collection of enhancement packages that add various visual, audio, and bug improvements for the PC version of the game. Notable examples of what the enhancements improve on is the use of a widescreen camera in the game; higher display resolutions; removal of prominent audio bugs; PlayStation 2 quality audio and fog; better controller support; and much more. The use of these enhancement packages, made by a collaborative team of wonderful modders and programmers, makes for a definitive Silent Hill 2 HD experience.
